author: dblevins
msg: Added HttpSession interface for server-side state in the webadmin
Added minimal cookie support and a Stateful SessionBean to use for sessions
Moved the DefaultHttpBean and the new Stateful SessionBean into the server
package and gave them their own *ejb-jar.xml files.

author: jboynes
msg: Change interceptor stack to build from inside out and make next field final
Removed old (unused) EJB code to avoid refactoring its interceptors (which aren't used anyway)
This is a BIG commit because there's a lot of stuff that uses Interceptor

author: dblevins
msg: Fix for [ 849442 ] ERROR: ... Cannot validate jar
Added better exception handing an message

author: djencks
msg: Start on mdb deployment.  Not fully tested, but it might conceivably work.  Also change mistaken apache license to openejb license
